reviews.review:
Phenomenal.
Gearbox has literally outdone them self on this masterpiece of a game. With strikingly superior graphics for this games time and innovative story telling, this game honestly deserves a remaster.
I remember sitting, waiting for this game to be released at a young age after beating the first Half-Life.
The story is fantastic, showing a different perspective. Instead of being the protagonist Gordon Freeman, you now take place as an antagonist known as Adrian Shepard. Moving on the the multi player, it is insanely fun. The excessive amount of explosions going on around you is an exciting add-on to this game. With servers still running 20 years later, this game is fantastic. Don't think that Opposing Force lacks a cooperative mode, because one Coop server is currently running with a maximum slot of 32 players per match.

Overall, this game is a splendid masterpiece and I would recommend anyone buying. It's worth spending on a game such as this one.
cover-ups were not in my job description.
Great game with Blue Shift and Half Life 1. Old is gold!

excellent follow up to half life. levels are fun to complete and the new weapons are fun too. there are a few bugs to watch out for, especially the one where the player gets stuck at the end of an elevator ride.
Must have for any Half-Life fan. Might be the best Half-Life expansion I have played.

This is a pretty good expansion for an already great game, it really goes off from where the last one started and adds various new mechanics, weapons, and enemies. One problem throughout the course game though, is the lack of any build upon the new mechanics, which are barely used. Overall, the game is somewhat moderate in it's difficulty, but it's not anything I'd consider frustrating. I'd personally give the game an 8/10, not as good as the original, but good enough for me to want to play it again.
It's a brilliant game. Played this a few times during my life and I'd recommend it to anyone.

Half Life Opposing Force is good spiritual successor to the original half life. It shows the apathy and brutal environment that the marines were thrown into during the black mesa incident. The story of Corporal Adrian Shephard is compelling one and is much more challenging than blue shift. The new weapons and tactics further improve the game play and just like Gordon, you have to think about the problem solving from a Marine's perspective. Overall a great game with great future potential.

as an avid half life fan, one who has played all the games available on steam, i would say Opposing Force is my least favorite of the series. games like this make me wish steam had a "ok" or "meh" recommendation button. its not bad, it plays like a half life game. but it doesn't feel that good to me. the solder's AI, the ones that can follow your felt more jank than in the original. there were many times there pathfinding broke on me trying to get through a doorway and i had to leave them behind. i did not like any of the new enemies, i did not like the rope climbing but all the new weapons were pretty nice. overall its okay to me but not great. i honestly prefer blue shift. i would not buy any of these expansions on there own in my opinion. but there nice additions when you get the valve compete pack
Nice little expansion for Half-Life. Took me about 3 hours to beat coming straight from the original. Harder than the base game.

This is some lit DLC fam, it introduces a lot of new shit from guns to enemies, some new tools aswell. It's nice to see a different POV and you can lead soldiers into battle (and they actually help too!) as an officer. Gearbox really did a great job recreating that magical spark half life 1 gave me. If you liked/loved half life definitly play this DLC, minimal handholding, classic half life levels and exploring. It's canon too. :)

Great 8/10
Please remake this as a black mesa dlc crowbar collective :D
eu gostei dese jogo perfeito para outros jogadores e muito bom

Yeah it's good.
About as good as HL1, so yeah.

Play as a corporal of the military but you're a good guy and there are fat security guys and then some really annoying aliens overtake the Xen ones.
oh god he's going to starve to death in that osprey what was creepy briefcase man thinking
Another fantastic Half-Life game. Playing through the series in order, Half-Life 2 next.....
su unico fallo es que la traduccion a otros idiomas esta solo un la version de disco o no-steam. por lo demas, es un trabajo formidable
its like half life but your on some sort of opposing force

epic military army hunt down the freeman.
 pog
DESTROY BIG MONSTERS 1 HIT KILL MAZE
I'm gonna tell my kids "This is Call Of Duty".
pretty good, I'd say it's worth playing but feels a little off from the OG half-life

Nada mas que decir jugue este DLC me lo pase y la verdad que esta muy bueno
trae nuevas armas aparte de las ya vistas en half life nuevos enemigos y nuevas mecanicas bastante buenas el unico problema que veo es que solo esta en ingles y a veces se  hace dificil entender los dialogos pero lejos de todo eso este juego es una obra de arte. Muy recomendado para jugar si andas aburrido 11/10
este es mejor que half life en mi opinion la mejor expancion
It really expands on the Black Mesa incident, through the eyes of a Marine!
Half Life 1 but with more weapons and more locations to explore

Opposing Force has more and a few different weapons from HL 1, they are very fun to play with. 
There are some new mechanics like rope climbing or troops which are useful in different ways.

So it gives a refreshing experience from HL 1, but still feels very much like Half Life.
Un buen complemento si te gusto el juego original.
No esta mal aunque un poco confuso
been spending the last half hour trying to keep my four man squad alive just to leave them behind by the rail train

this is the best half life game. 



thank you for coming to my presentation
I wonder where Adrian Shepard went.

I loved this game. Having friendly HECU soldiers were nice. The bosses were neat especially the last boss it was so thrilling but i turned on god mod cuz i always died
To me this one changed up a bit too much but it is still good. The A.I. on the soldiers is crap though.

Original and Blue Shift are better, Opposing Force is still great tho don't get me wrong but it's just missing a storyline.
The least Fun out of the Original 3 Games but still enjoyable
Really looked forwards to this game, buttttttttttt,  the mouse setting don't work and can't be arsed to play it after going through the setting and nothing works. IE, THANKS for nothing!!

Opposing Force is a great expansion to an already very good game. An awesome training course, new levels, new weapons that are super fun to use, new enemies like race X, and newly introduced squad mechanics help spice up Half Life's formula while staying entertaining. Opposing Force is a must play for fans of Half Life,
